unix-time.name: Unix Time Converter
unix-time.description: Convert between Unix timestamp and human-readable date format

random.name: Random Generator
random.description: Generate random strings, numbers, UUIDs, passwords and lists
random.medium: Medium (letters, numbers and some special characters)
random.strong: Strong (letters, numbers and many special characters)

jwt-decoder.name: JWT Decoder
jwt-decoder.description: Parse and decode JWT (JSON Web Token)
jwt-decoder.signatureInfo: The JWT signature is used to verify the integrity of the token. This tool only decodes the header and payload, it cannot verify the signature.

json-formatter.name: JSON Formatter
json-formatter.feature1: Format and beautify JSON with proper indentation
json-formatter.feature3: Minify JSON by removing unnecessary whitespace

url-encoder.name: URL Encoder/Decoder
url-encoder.encodePlaceholder: Enter text or URL to encode...
url-encoder.infoDescription: URL encoding converts characters into a format that can be transmitted over the Internet.
url-encoder.encodeUriInfo: Encodes a URI by escaping all characters except A-Z a-z 0-9 - _ . ! ~ * ' ( ) ; , / ? : @ & = + $ #
url-encoder.encodeUriComponentInfo: Encodes a URI component by escaping all characters except A-Z a-z 0-9 - _ . ! ~ * ' ( )

base64.name: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
base64.aboutDescription: Base64 is a group of binary-to-text encoding schemes that represent binary data in an ASCII string format.
base64.useCase1: Embedding images in HTML or CSS
base64.useCase2: Storing complex data in XML or JSON

hash-generator.name: Hash Generator
hash-generator.description: Generate various hashes (MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, etc.)
hash-generator.aboutDescription: Hash functions are mathematical algorithms that convert data of arbitrary size to a fixed-size hash value.
hash-generator.sha1Info: 160-bit hash, considered insecure for cryptographic use
hash-generator.note: Note: MD5 hashing is not available in this demo. For production use, consider using a dedicated library.

home.title: JToolset
home.subtitle: A collection of free tools to help make your development work easier.

feature1.title: Free & Open Source
feature1.description: All tools are completely free, no registration or software download required.

feature2.title: Works in browser
feature2.description: Process data right in your browser, no data is sent to servers.

feature3.title: Mobile optimized
feature3.description: Responsive design, allowing you to use it on any device.

toolsList.title: All Tools
toolsList.subtitle: Explore all developer tools
toolsList.needSomethingElse: Can't find the tool you need?

common.shareMessage: If you find this tool useful, share it with your friends and colleagues!
common.desc: A free toolkit for web developers and programmers.
